Test Name: Serum Soluble Lymphocyte Extract (SOLE) and Immunoglobulin E (IGE)
Purpose: To quantitatively measure SOLE, IGE, and related serum analytes, ensuring accurate, reliable diagnostic results.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Centrifuge; assay-specific automated analyzers or ELISA kits; pipettes
